DESeqAnalysis 0.2.14
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Top tables

Source: R/topTables-methods.R
topTables.Rd

Top tables of differentially expressed genes.

topTables(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqResults
topTables(object, DESeqDataSet = NULL, n = 10L)

# S4 method for DESeqAnalysis
topTables(object, i, n = 10L, lfcShrink = TRUE)

# S4 method for list
topTables(object, n = 10L, contrast = NULL)

Arguments

object

Object.
DESeqDataSet

DESeqDataSet or NULL.
n

integer(1). Number of genes (per direction) to report.
i

Indices specifying elements to extract or replace. Indices are numeric or character vectors, empty (missing), or NULL.

For more information:

help(topic = "Extract", package = "base")
lfcShrink

logical(1). Use shrunken log2 fold change (LFC) values.
contrast

character(1) or NULL. Contrast name.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

kable. Markdown tables.

Functions

  • topTables,list-method: Legacy support for tbl_df list returned from resultsTables(). This method is still supported because it is used in the F1000 v2 workflow paper. Otherwise, we now recommend using the DESeqAnalysis method directly.

Note

Updated 2019-11-12.

Examples

data(deseq)

## DESeqAnalysis ====
topTables(deseq, i = 1L, n = 5L)
#> condition_B_vs_A (shrunken LFC)
#> Returning with the sample names unmodified.
#> Joining row annotations.
#> Joining size factor adjusted normalized counts.
#> 40 differentially expressed genes detected.
#> 22 upregulated genes detected.
#> 18 downregulated genes detected.
#> 
#> 
#> |        | baseMean|lfc  |padj     |broadClass |geneName |description                                 |
#> |:-------|--------:|:----|:--------|:----------|:--------|:-------------------------------------------|
#> |gene190 |      451|2.61 |4.15e-11 |coding     |CRAMP1   |cramped chromatin regulator homolog 1       |
#> |gene343 |      260|3.58 |2.90e-09 |coding     |MAMLD1   |mastermind like domain containing 1         |
#> |gene032 |      246|2.47 |3.36e-05 |coding     |TMEM176A |transmembrane protein 176A                  |
#> |gene436 |      244|1.83 |1.21e-04 |coding     |DEF6     |DEF6, guanine nucleotide exchange factor    |
#> |gene488 |       42|2.78 |1.39e-04 |coding     |FAM13B   |family with sequence similarity 13 member B |
#> 
#> 
#> |        | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |broadClass |geneName |description                                        |
#> |:-------|--------:|:-----|:--------|:----------|:--------|:--------------------------------------------------|
#> |gene406 |      292|-2.02 |2.28e-06 |coding     |SERPINB1 |serpin family B member 1                           |
#> |gene361 |      144|-1.75 |1.04e-04 |coding     |MATR3    |matrin 3                                           |
#> |gene065 |      118|-2.11 |1.21e-04 |coding     |ARX      |aristaless related homeobox                        |
#> |gene293 |       31|-2.83 |1.21e-04 |coding     |DPF1     |double PHD fingers 1                               |
#> |gene475 |      197|-1.88 |1.39e-04 |coding     |ARNTL2   |aryl hydrocarbon receptor nuclear translocator ... |

## DESeqResults 'resultsTables()' list ====
res <- results(deseq, i = 1L)
#> condition_B_vs_A (unshrunken LFC)
resTbl <- resultsTables(res, return = "tbl_df")
#> 40 differentially expressed genes detected.
#> 22 upregulated genes detected.
#> 18 downregulated genes detected.
topTables(resTbl)
#> 
#> 
#> |        | baseMean|lfc  |padj     |
#> |:-------|--------:|:----|:--------|
#> |gene190 |      451|2.70 |4.15e-11 |
#> |gene343 |      260|3.73 |2.90e-09 |
#> |gene032 |      246|2.66 |3.36e-05 |
#> |gene436 |      244|1.97 |1.21e-04 |
#> |gene488 |       42|3.05 |1.39e-04 |
#> |gene217 |       77|1.89 |3.59e-04 |
#> |gene242 |      392|1.89 |3.59e-04 |
#> |gene262 |      120|1.87 |3.59e-04 |
#> |gene272 |      351|1.79 |3.59e-04 |
#> |gene304 |       79|2.19 |3.65e-04 |
#> 
#> 
#> |        | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |
#> |:-------|--------:|:-----|:--------|
#> |gene406 |      292|-2.13 |2.28e-06 |
#> |gene361 |      144|-1.88 |1.04e-04 |
#> |gene065 |      118|-2.28 |1.21e-04 |
#> |gene293 |       31|-3.10 |1.21e-04 |
#> |gene475 |      197|-2.04 |1.39e-04 |
